sections.heading: Procedure;
sections.text: trial of primary offense; prior convictions.

sections.heading: Refusal
sections.text:
to relinquish public telephone for emergency call unlawful; false declaration

of emergency to obtain use of public telephone unlawful.

sections.heading: Telephone
sections.text: directory must contain warning notice of offense provided inNRS 207.163.

sections.heading: Interference
sections.text: with emergency transmission on Citizens� Radio Service unlawful; presumptions.

sections.heading: False,
sections.text: deceptive or misleading advertising and other sales practices.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text: penalties; action by Attorney General or district attorney.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for violation of injunction or order.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text:
for commission of certain unlawful acts because of actual or perceived race,

color, religion, national origin, physical or mental disability, sexual

orientation or gender identity or expression of another person or group of

persons; burden of proof; comments as evidence.

sections.heading: Coercion:
sections.text: Hearing to determine whether sexually motivated.

sections.heading: Use
sections.text:
of monetary instrument or other property representing proceeds or derived from

unlawful activity; conducting financial transaction concerning monetary

instrument or other property derived from unlawful activity; conducting

financial transaction with intent to evade certain federal or state laws.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: trespass upon land; warning against trespassing.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
trespass upon licensed gaming establishment by person previously convicted of

certain offenses relating to prostitution or solicitation for prostitution.

sections.heading: Jumping
Posting
sections.text: land without permission of owner or occupant.

sections.heading: Destruction
sections.text: of signs or notices forbidding trespass.

sections.heading: Use
sections.text:
of system providing telephone number to be used in emergency when no actual or

perceived emergency exists; calling nonemergency telephone line to report

emergency when no actual or perceived emergency exists; penalties.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: contact with child or person with mental illness.

sections.heading: Loitering
sections.text: about school or public place where children congregate.

sections.heading: Making
sections.text:
false or misleading statement to cause activation of Statewide Alert System for

the Safe Return of Abducted Children or Statewide Alert System for the Safe

Return of Missing Endangered Older Persons.

sections.heading: Giving
sections.text: or accepting bribe to influence outcome of sporting event.

sections.heading: Unsolicited
sections.text: transmission of advertisement to facsimile machine.

sections.heading: Counterfeiting
sections.text:
or forging registry identification card or letter of approval issued for

engaging in acts relating to medical use of cannabis; possessing counterfeit or

forged registry identification card or letter of approval; penalty.

sections.heading: Simulation
sections.text:
of summons, complaint, judgment, order or other legal process; rebuttable

presumption; penalty.

sections.heading: Acts
sections.text:
concerning federal food stamps; prosecution by district attorney or Attorney

General.

sections.heading: Impersonation
sections.text: of officer or employee of utility.

sections.heading: Account
sections.text:
for Prosecution of Racketeering created; use and distribution of money by

Attorney General; reimbursement of Account.

sections.text: forfeiture: Property subject to forfeiture; substitution for unreachable property.

sections.text: forfeiture: Temporary restraining order to preserve property.

sections.text: forfeiture: Order of forfeiture; protection of property.

sections.text: actions for damages resulting from racketeering.

sections.text: of court upon determination of civil liability.

Use,
sections.text:
sale and other disposal of forfeited property by State, county or city; payment
